original_text: Anyone who lives together with Christ does not continue to do wrong things. If anyone continues to do wrong things, that person has not understood who Christ is. He does not know Christ.
korean_text: 그 안에 거하는 자마다 범죄하지 아니하나니 범죄하는 자마다 그를 보지도 못하였고 그를 알지도 못하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Anyone who lives together with Christ
does not continue to do wrong things
If anyone continues to do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누군가 계속해서 잘못된 것을 한다면

sentences.original_text: that person has not understood who Christ is
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 그리스도가 누구인지 이해하지 못한 것이다
